com.rivelbop.rivelworks.preset

Class VehicleMovementPhysicsPreset

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.preset.VehicleMovementPhysicsPreset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class VehicleMovementPhysicsPreset
extends com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
    A physics preset for vehicle movement.
    Author:
    David/Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Constructor Detail

      • VehicleMovementPhysicsPreset

        public VehicleMovementPhysicsPreset(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite,
                                    DynamicBody2D body,
                                    float acceleration,
                                    float deceleration,
                                    float maxSpeed,
                                    float rotationSpeed,
                                    float PPM)
        Creates a vehicle from the provided sprite, physics body, movement constants, and pixels per meter conversion.
        Parameters:
        sprite - The visual for the body.
        body - The physics body that is moved.
        acceleration - The acceleration of the body.
        deceleration - The deceleration of the body.
        maxSpeed - The maximum speed of the body.
        rotationSpeed - The speed at which the body rotates.
        PPM - Pixels per meter conversion.
